thread.title: RuPaul's Drag Race Stars SLAM VH1 For Hiring 'Transphobic' Wendy Williams To Host Pre-Show!
thread.title_full: RuPaul's Drag Race Stars SLAM VH1 For Hiring 'Transphobic' Wendy Williams To Host Pre-Show! | PerezHilton.com

author: perezhilton
title: RuPaul's Drag Race Stars SLAM VH1 For Hiring 'Transphobic' Wendy Williams To Host Pre-Show!
text:
How you doin' ? Not well, apparently!
Earlier this month, it was announced that Wendy Williams would host Fierce Fridays , a live RuPaul's Drag Race viewing party that would air on VH1 right before new episodes of the hit competition show.
Related: Wendy Does NOT Want Paris Jackson To Call Herself Black! 
However, many of the program's past contestants are calling BS on this casting choice!
On Monday, drag queen Detox — who appeared on the fifth season — posted the following screenshot on Instagram of a Facebook message from fellow performer Stephanie Stone accusing the talk show host of kicking Erick Atoure Aviance out of her audience for dressing in drag:
